mapper.insert: insert into reply(memId,title,content,writer, bgroup, bseq, blevel) select #{memId},#{title},#{content},#{writer}, IFNULL(max(bgroup)+1, 0),0,0 from reply
mapper.delete: update reply set bdelete=1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: update reply set title=#{title},content=#{content} where idx=#{idx}
update reply set count=count+1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(memId,title,content,writer, bgroup, bseq, blevel) value(#{memId},#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{bgroup},#{bseq},#{blevel})
mapper.update: update reply set bseq=bseq+1 where bgroup=#{bgroup} and bseq>#{bseq}
